summary: This is an email chain from August 2019 forwarding a July 2019 email regarding a U.S. Marshals Service (USMS) investigation into a possible International Megan's Law violation by Jeffrey Epstein, whose primary residence was noted as the U.S. Virgin Islands. The correspondence is between U.S. Attorney's Offices.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of a U.S. Marshals Service investigation for a possible International Megan's Law violation. His primary residence is noted as the U.S. Virgin Islands.

persons.name: Ron De Lugo
persons.context: Listed as the head of the Office of the U.S. Attorney for the Virgin Islands, from which the email originates.

events.title: USMS Investigation into Epstein for IML Violation
events.description: The U.S. Marshals Service is conducting an investigation into a possible International Megan's Law violation by Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's primary residence was identified as the U.S. Virgin Islands (USVI).
The U.S. Marshals Service (USMS) had an ongoing investigation into a possible International Megan's Law violation by Epstein as of July 2019.
The email chain shows coordination between U.S. Attorney's Offices in New York and the Virgin Islands regarding this investigation.
